title: Carry the show wherever you go with this projector on sale for Black Friday
content:
The Prima 1080p HD Pocket Projector lets you carry a 200-inch screen with you in your pocket, and it’s on sale during Black Friday for $195.98 (Reg. $799) with coupon code APPS30. This project is barely bigger than an iPhone, but you can cast a crystal clear image onto any surface. 

Wherever you are, the Prima lets you enjoy HD video of sports, gaming, movies, or anything else you can stream. The video is crisp, and the setup is easy. Connect to your pocket projector from the app to stream directly to the Prima. Or you can sync it to your phone, laptop, or tablet and stream from there. Or connect via Bluetooth, WiFi, or a wired connection. Once you’re synced up with the Prima, you can project clear, straight images onto any surface using the automatic keystone angle adjustments, which makes it perfect for camping. 

Get the Prima 1080p HD Pocket Projector for $195.98 (Reg. $799) with coupon code APPS30 during the sitewide Black Friday sale! 

Prices subject to change.
